embeds.title: Welcome to the Runtipi Official Discord
embeds.description:
Runtipi is a personal home server orchestrator.
It is running docker containers under the hood and provides a simple web interface to manage them. Every service comes with an opinionated configuration in order to remove the need for manual configuration and network setup.

**Information**

- Our Website [https://www.runtipi.io](https://www.runtipi.io)
- Our Github: [https://github.com/runtipi/runtipi-appstore](https://github.com/runtipi/runtipi-appstore)
- Our Appstore Github: [https://github.com/runtipi/runtipi-appstore](https://github.com/runtipi/runtipi-appstore)

embeds.title: App Store
embeds.description:
The Runtipi app store has a wide range of selfhosted apps you can install on your server. You can find them all in your Runtipi dashboard, [our website](https://runtipi.io/docs/apps-available) or [app store repository](https://github.com/runtipi/runtipi-appstore)

How can I request an app?
- Feel free to request an app in the [app store repository](https://github.com/runtipi/runtipi-appstore) or in #‚Å†üíª„Éªsuggestions

How can I submit a new app to Runtipi?
- Follow this guide on the [documentation site here](https://runtipi.io/docs/contributing/adding-a-new-app)
